primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God enters the domain of radical evil (Hell) to vanquish the Prince of Darkness and reclaim the cosmos for His kingdom.

tekstueel_bewijs: God has entered the lists against the Prince of Darkness.
The Messiah is going to reign for ever and ever.

object.identificatie: The Cosmos / The Human Race / Deliverance from the Domain of Darkness
tekstueel_bewijs: The kingdoms of this world have become the Kingdom of our Lord.
We were two sinners rejoicing in the same salvation.
The Father... sent from the heavenly throne his only begotten son.

ontvanger.identificatie: The 'Saints' / The Hearers / The Victims of Darkness
tekstueel_bewijs: Nothing... will be able to separate us from the love of God.
To do justice to the victims of darkness.

helper.identificatie: The Liturgy / Advent Tradition / Michael and his angels
tekstueel_bewijs: Michael and his angels fighting against the dragon.
The Advent collect: 'Almighty God, give us grace'.

tegenstander.identificatie: Radical Evil / Satan / The Domain of Darkness
tekstueel_bewijs: An evil intelligence determined on its own supremacy.
The hideous strength of the realm of wickedness.
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: Evil is described as an independent, intelligent, and aggressive power that exceeds human folly.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The church/believer resisting the devil in the present time through ministry and witness.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer / The Church (e.g., Susan and David)
secundair_narratief_programma.object: Resisting the devil / Ministering to traumatized children
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The human action is a 'sign' or 'witness' of the primary victory of God.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.subject_naar_object: God → Reclaiming the Domain of Darkness

voorbeelden_god_subject: The Messiah is going to reign.
He shall reign for ever and ever.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We don’t want our nice pretty holiday spoiled.

voorbeelden: We must believe in the hideous strength of the realm of wickedness.
We don’t want our nice pretty holiday spoiled.
The wisdom of earlier centuries was sometimes greater than ours.
Nothing... will be able to separate us.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on the 'Power' of God to overcome the 'Power' of Evil, rather than the 'Duty' of humans.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From ~S2 (denial of hell) to S2 (acknowledging radical evil) to S1 (God's final victory).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved eschatologically: S1 (God) overthrows S2 (Satan) completely.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; S2 is treated as a 'hideous strength' that only God can defeat.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. While it demands 'belief' in hell, the active agency of salvation and the final victory rests entirely on God's initiative.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God has entered the lists against the Prince of Darkness.
It will be God’s doing, not ours.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures are not used as moral examples; rather, contemporary figures (the Clarks) are used as signs of God's reconciling work.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The sermon already provides a theocentric reading of the bridesmaids: the focus is on the Bridegroom's arrival and the reality of the door.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and awe at the scale of God's victory over real evil.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic salvation: God acts, man receives.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The narrative of the 'Four Last Things' is perfectly integrated with the Christological invasion of the world.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: God has entered the lists against the Prince of Darkness. Satan has met his master.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The sermon focuses more on the Son's victory than the Spirit's indwelling.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Radical evil is an intelligent, aggressive power, not just human mistake.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon maintains a strict theocentric actantial structure where God is the Subject of the primary narrative of cosmic rescue.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: The current balance is appropriate for a Christus Victor sermon.

tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: High-intensity opponent necessitates a high-power Savior.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (God's victory) clearly precedes and enables Ethics (the work in Liberia).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a masterclass in avoiding moralism while taking the reality of evil seriously. It correctly identifies God as the only Subject capable of defeating the 'Heavy Opponent' of radical evil.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: A rhetorical analysis might focus on the use of music/hymns; Greimas shows that these are actantial 'Helpers' in the narrative of God's invasion.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would focus on the bridesmaids; Greimas shows how the bridesmaids function as Receivers of the Bridegroom's action.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the sermon's power comes from the 'Subject-Switch'—moving from human inability to God's 'Pouvoir-faire'.

appendices.notities: The sermon successfully uses a 'Heavy Opponent' to prevent the grace from appearing 'cheap'.
